title: Andrew Bowie – 2022 Comments on the Trade Surplus Left by John Major’s Government
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andrew Bowie, the Conservative MP for West Aberdeenshire and Kincardine, on Twitter on 3 November 2022.
content: Labour inherited a trade surplus of £4.6b in 1997, and left the country with a trade deficit of £35.1b in 2010.
This Government won’t take any lessons from the Labour party and is determined to drive up trade, not just with the EU but worldwide.
